title: Episode 819 - Special Guest Theoretical Physicist Michio Kaku
itunes:author: Tetherball Academy Media
itunes:subtitle: Ross Patterson and Dan Hollaway are joined by theoretical physicist and the New York Times Best Selling author of “The God Equation,” Michio Kaku to discuss String Theory, the existence of God and other dimensions, how humans could (and should) colonize ...
itunes:summary:
Ross Patterson and Dan Hollaway are joined by theoretical physicist and the New York Times Best Selling author of “The God Equation,” Michio Kaku to discuss String Theory, the existence of God and other dimensions, how humans could (and should) colonize the universe and one day learn to manipulate space and time, and what he believes the destiny of the human race should be.
